SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.product_id, p.prd_name, p.prd_brand, p.price, p.rating, p.review_count, /* 정렬에 필요하므로 반드시 SELECT에 포함해야 함 */
(SELECT pi.IMAGE_URL FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE pi WHERE pi.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) AS image_url,
/* 점수 계산 로직 */ ( (CASE WHEN b.FIRST = #{first} THEN 10 WHEN b.FIRST IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE -30 END) + (CASE WHEN b.SECOND = #{second} THEN 10 WHEN b.SECOND IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE -30 END) + (CASE WHEN b.THIRD = #{third} THEN 10 WHEN b.THIRD IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE -30 END) + (CASE WHEN b.FOURTH = #{fourth} THEN 10 WHEN b.FOURTH IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE -30 END) ) AS match_score
FROM PRODUCT p JOIN BAUMANN b ON p.baumann_id = b.baumann_id ) WHERE match_score >= 20 /* 20점 이상인 데이터만 필터링 */ ORDER BY match_score DESC, review_count DESC, rating DESC
